content: Thank you for having me! For all of you, who do not know me. I'm a post doctoral researcher associated with the University of Oslo. I have a PhD in Astroparticle Physics. I'm particularly interested in ozone though tout the whole atmospheric domain (from stratospheric depletion and VSLS, spring-time Arctic depletion due to bromine explosions, air quality, plant health...). In recent years I have been focussing on ozone-vegetation interactions which brought me to the CLM/CESM. I'm experienced in python, fortran, c++/c, and bash programming. I've also done some programming in java (when it was still a common joke to refer to the island) and assembler. Nice to meet all of you!
Welcome to Zulip, @Stefanie Falk! Thanks for introducing yourself and we look forward to having you join the conversation!
